fastDFE
  • Logging
  • View page source

LoggingÔÉÅ

fastDFE uses the standard Python logging module for logging. By default, fastDFE logs to the console at the INFO level. You can change the logging level, to DEBUG for example, after importing fastdfe as follows:

import fastdfe, logging

logging.getLogger('fastdfe').setLevel(logging.DEBUG)

You can also disable the progress bar like this:

fastdfe.disable_pbar = True
